decision_conditions: The proposed development constitutes permitted development by virtue of the provisions of  Schedule 2, Part 7, Class M of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).

Notwithstanding the approved plans, the improvement works undertaken to the Quod shall not supersede those which have been secured as part of Planning Decision Reference 532/APP/2018/3375 and as amended by 532/APP/2019/3401.
description: The proposed development comprises alterations to the eastern facade of the Hamilton Centre at Brunel University. The plans comprise the removal of existing ground floor glazing to create new entrances into the building. Landscaping changes (including the raising of levels, new terrace and stairs/ramps) are also proposed to facilitate access between the new entrances and the Quod.
